title: Holiday travel privacy risks and how to stay safe
description: Travel companies share passenger data with third parties during holidays, but travelers can protect themselves by removing data from broker sites and using aliases.
content: Holiday travel is stressful enough with crowded airports, expensive flights and last-minute itinerary changes. But there's a hidden part of the travel industry most people don't know about: your pers… [+9857 chars]
